name: .PSK
summary: Learn about .PSK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Autodesk Maya with PSK import add-on
Autodesk 3ds Max with PSK import add-on

instructions: You can open PSK files with the following 3D modeling programs, after installing PSK-related add-ons:
A PSK import add-on for Blender is available here. Note that, while you can open and convert PSK files with Blender, you cannot edit them.

To import a PSK file into current versions of Epic Games Unreal Engine (Windows, Mac), you must first convert the file to an FBX file. You can use any of the following programs to convert a PSK file to an FBX file:

These programs can also convert PSK files to other 3D model formats. Remember that, to open and convert PSK files with Blender, Autodesk Maya, or Autodesk 3ds Max, you must first install a PSK import add-on.
